title: Exploring the Educational Integration Effects of LLM in Higher Education Social Sciences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic writing skills and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: For adult learners in graduate social science programs, implementation of self-directed learning scenarios using LLMs in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design academic writing structures using Large Language Models (LLMs)
Learners can improve writing quality by over 20% through LLM-based feedback systems
Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies during LLM usage to maintain academic engagement

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
